en: If you want to be on time, you should be there by 11 o'clock.
zh: 如果你想准时，你应该在11点之前到达。

en: If you are to succeed in the exam, you must study hard.
zh: 如果你想在考试中成功，你必须努力学习。

en: If you had helped me, I could have accomplished the work.
zh: 如果你当时帮了我，我就能完成这项工作了。

en: I don't want to go if you don't go with me.
zh: 如果你不和我一起去，我就不想去。

en: If you will help us, we will be very glad.
zh: 如果你愿意帮助我们，我们会非常高兴。

en: If you are a member of a primitive community and you wish to produce, say, food, there are two things that you must do.
zh: 如果你是一个原始社群的成员，并且你想要生产，比如说，食物，那么你有两件事必须要做。

en: If you hurry, you will soon overtake her.
zh: 如果你快点，你很快就能赶上她。

en: You're playing with fire if you insist on riding your motorcycle without a helmet on.
zh: 如果你坚持不戴头盔骑摩托车，你就是在玩火。

en: Were you to know the fact you would be surprised.
zh: 如果你知道这件事，你会很惊讶的。

en: Had you run all the way, you'd have got there in time.
zh: 如果你当时一路跑过去，你就能及时赶到了。

en: If you had parked your car here, you would have been fined.
zh: 如果你当时把车停在这里，你会被罚款的。

en: If only you were here, I could consult you about it.
zh: 要是你在这儿就好了，我可以和你商量这件事。

en: If you had missed that bus, you might not be here now.
zh: 如果你当时错过了那班车，你现在可能就不会在这里了。

en: Suppose you had ten million yen, what would you do?
zh: 假设你有1000万日元，你会做什么？

en: If it were not for air and water, nothing could live.
zh: 如果没有空气和水，任何东西都无法生存。

en: If it were not for air and water, nothing alive would exist.
zh: 如果没有空气和水，任何活物都不会存在。

en: If it were not for the air, planes could not fly.
zh: 如果没有空气，飞机就无法飞行。

en: They would have gotten a better exchange rate if they had gone to a bank.
zh: 如果他们去银行兑换，他们就能得到更好的汇率。

en: If I got rich, I would buy it.
zh: 如果我变得富有，我会买下它。

en: If I had money, I could buy it.
zh: 如果我有钱，我就能买下它。

en: Thousands of lives will be at stake if emergency food does not arrive there within a few days.
zh: 如果紧急食物没有在几天内运到那里，成千上万的生命将危在旦夕。

en: If there's anything urgent, you can get in touch with me.
zh: 如果有什么紧急的事情，你可以联系我。

en: If you hurry, you will catch up with him.
zh: 如果你快点，你就能赶上他。

en: If you hurry, you will overtake him.
zh: 如果你快点，你就能超过他。

en: Let me know in case you feel sick.
zh: 如果你感觉不舒服，请告诉我。

en: If she's not careful she'll tear a ligament doing that.
zh: 如果她不小心，那样做会撕裂韧带的。

en: Should you change your mind, let me know.
zh: 如果你改变主意，请告诉我。

en: You may go home if you want to.
zh: 如果你想，你可以回家。

en: There will be hell to pay if I don't make this deadline.
zh: 如果我不能按时完成这个截止日期，就会有大麻烦。

en: Correct me if I am wrong.
zh: 如果我说错了，请纠正我。

en: He seems to be afraid of being laughed at if he makes a mistake.
zh: 他似乎害怕犯错后被人嘲笑。

en: If the patient is unconscious, the family can make the decision.
zh: 如果病人失去知觉，家属可以做决定。

en: What will become of our offspring if a nuclear war breaks out?
zh: 如果爆发核战争，我们的后代会怎么样？

en: But for everybody's support, I would not have passed the examination.
zh: 如果没有大家的支持，我就不会通过考试。

en: If the vase is not found, John may be accused of stealing it.
zh: 如果花瓶找不到，约翰可能会被指控偷窃。

en: If a fire should break out, I would make off with my flute.
zh: 万一发生火灾，我会带着我的长笛逃跑。

en: If I had time, I would study French.
zh: 如果我有时间，我会学习法语。

en: If anything goes wrong, I'll answer for the consequences.
zh: 如果出了什么问题，我来承担后果。

en: In case anything happens, call me immediately.
zh: 万一发生什么事，立即给我打电话。

en: If I were to live abroad, I would live in Britain.
zh: 如果我要住在国外，我会住在英国。

en: If you want a pencil, I'll lend you one.
zh: 如果你想要铅笔，我可以借给你一支。

en: Please drop it in the mail if it's not out of your way.
zh: 如果顺路的话，请把它寄出去。

en: If that's false, she's a liar.
zh: 如果那是假的，她就是个骗子。

en: If it rains, take the washing in.
zh: 如果下雨，就把洗的衣服收进来。

en: If it rains, the excursion will be called off.
zh: 如果下雨，郊游就会取消。

en: If it's raining, we don't plan to go hiking.
zh: 如果下雨，我们就不打算去徒步旅行。

en: I will put off my departure if it rains.
zh: 如果下雨，我会推迟我的出发。

en: Suppose it rains, what shall we do?
zh: 假设下雨了，我们该怎么办？

en: What would you do if you saw a man from another planet?
zh: 如果你看到一个来自其他星球的人，你会怎么做？

en: If you can use this typewriter perfectly in a month, you may keep it.
zh: 如果你能在一个月内完美地使用这台打字机，你就可以留下它。

en: If it were not for great books, our lives would be much the poorer.
zh: 如果没有伟大的书籍，我们的生活将会贫乏得多。

en: But for the safety belt, I wouldn't be alive today.
zh: 要不是安全带，我今天就不会活着了。

en: If he wanted to get to London today, he should leave now.
zh: 如果他想今天到伦敦，他现在就应该出发。

en: I am wondering if you would like to go and see Kabuki with me while staying in Japan.
zh: 在日本期间，你是否愿意和我一起去看歌舞伎？

en: Please come to my house next Saturday if you care to.
zh: 如果你愿意，下周六请来我家。

en: Until next weekend, if that's OK.
zh: 如果可以的话，下周末见。

en: I'd like to invite you to lunch, if you're not busy.
zh: 如果你不忙，我想邀请你共进午餐。

en: Would you mind terribly making me a cup of coffee?
zh: 你介意帮我泡一杯咖啡吗？

en: If it is free, please send me a copy.
zh: 如果是免费的，请寄一份给我。

en: If they are not free, please let me know how much the catalogue and the postage to Japan are.
zh: 如果不是免费的，请告诉我目录和邮寄到日本的邮费是多少。

en: If you wish us to reserve an alternative room, please let us know immediately.
zh: 如果您希望我们预订其他房间，请立即告知我们。

en: If peace cannot be maintained with honor, it is no longer peace.
zh: 如果不能以荣誉来维护和平，那就不是和平了。

en: If he told me the truth, I would have forgiven him.
zh: 如果他告诉我真相，我会原谅他的。

en: If the brain is dead, we should let the patient die.
zh: 如果大脑已经死亡，我们应该让病人死去。

en: If he had carried the map with him, he wouldn't have got lost.
zh: 如果他随身带着地图，他就不会迷路了。

en: If you cannot make full remittance, please get in touch with me by October 28, 1998.
zh: 如果您无法全额汇款，请在1998年10月28日之前与我联系。

en: If God did not exist, it would be necessary to invent him.
zh: 如果上帝不存在，就有必要创造他。

en: If I had had enough money, I would have bought the bag.
zh: 如果我有足够的钱，我就会买下那个包。

en: If I were to tell him the truth, he would be angry.
zh: 如果我告诉他真相，他会生气的。

en: If I were to be reborn, I would like to be a bird.
zh: 如果我能重生，我想成为一只鸟。

en: If I had to define life in a word, it would be: Life is creation.
zh: 如果我必须用一个词来定义生命，那就是：生命是创造。

en: If I could have a wish, I'd wish I could make up for lost time.
zh: 如果我能有一个愿望，我希望我能弥补失去的时间。

en: If you should have any trouble, don't hesitate to come to me.
zh: 如果你遇到任何麻烦，不要犹豫来找我。

en: If you are having temporary financial problems and it is the cause of your outstanding account, let us know about it.
zh: 如果您遇到暂时的财务问题，并且这是您未付账款的原因，请告诉我们。

en: If anything comes up that you don't understand, come to me.
zh: 如果有什么你不明白的地方，就来找我。

en: You'd better put aside some money for a rainy day.
zh: 你最好存点钱以备不时之需。

en: You'd not have been in the rush hour if you had left home earlier.
zh: 如果你早点出门，就不会赶上高峰期了。

en: Had he worked harder, he could have succeeded.
zh: 如果他更努力工作，他本可以成功的。

en: If I had more time, I would learn how to dance.
zh: 如果我有更多时间，我会学习跳舞。

en: And if I lose thy love, I lose my all.
zh: 如果我失去了你的爱，我就失去了一切。

en: If the machine is damaged, you are responsible.
zh: 如果机器损坏了，你要负责。

en: Hello. May I speak to Mr Johnson, please?
zh: 你好。请问我可以和约翰逊先生说话吗？

en: Hello. This is Joe Carlton. May I speak to Michael?
zh: 你好。我是乔·卡尔顿。我可以和迈克尔说话吗？

en: Hello. This is Ogawa speaking.
zh: 你好。我是小川。

en: Are you there?
zh: 你在吗？

en: Excuse me. That fare is not enough.
zh: 不好意思。车费不够。

en: Hello, it's me. Could you come pick me up at the station?
zh: 喂，是我。你能来车站接我吗？

en: Hello, I'm Tomoko Sato from Japan.
zh: 你好，我是来自日本的佐藤智子。

en: Hello, is this the personnel department?
zh: 你好，请问是人事部吗？

en: Hello. Is this the Gotos' residence?
zh: 你好，请问这里是后藤家吗？

en: Hello, is the accountant there, please?
zh: 你好，请问会计在吗？

en: Excuse me, but do you need any help?
zh: 打扰一下，需要帮忙吗？

en: Hello, is Mr Freeman in?
zh: 你好，请问弗里曼先生在吗？

en: Hello, this is Mike.
zh: 你好，我是迈克。

en: Operator, I'd like to place a call to Winnipeg, Canada, but I can't quite remember the number.
zh: 请接线员帮我拨打到加拿大温尼伯的电话，但我不太记得号码了。

en: If we have not covered all the questions you asked, please inform us.
zh: 如果我们没有涵盖您提出的所有问题，请告知我们。

en: If Cleopatra's nose had been shorter, the whole face of the world would have been changed.
zh: 如果克利奥帕特拉的鼻子短一些，整个世界的面貌都会改变。

en: With a little more patience, you would have succeeded.
zh: 如果再多一点耐心，你就会成功了。

en: If it had not been for your advice, I would have failed in my business.
zh: 如果不是你的建议，我的生意就会失败。

en: Please let us know if we can be of help in other ways.
zh: 如果我们在其他方面可以提供帮助，请告诉我们。

en: If the delay is simply an oversight, will you please take care of it at once?
zh: 如果延误仅仅是疏忽，请您立即处理好吗？

en: We accept making a reduction in price of 5% if this will help you to develop a new market for our products.
zh: 如果这能帮助您为我们的产品开发新市场，我们接受降价5%。

en: If music be the food of love, play on.
zh: 如果音乐是爱情的食粮，那就演奏下去吧。

en: Please let me know if I can provide you with any further information, or if you would like to contact me for questions.
zh: 如果我能为您提供任何进一步的信息，或者您想联系我咨询问题，请告诉我。

en: Please disregard this notice if your shipment has already been made.
zh: 如果您的货物已经发货，请忽略此通知。

en: Should you have settled the account since this mail was written, please ignore our reminder.
zh: 如果您在邮件发出后已经结清了账款，请忽略我们的提醒。

en: Please let me know immediately if you would like to use this computer.
zh: 如果您想使用这台电脑，请立即告诉我。

en: If Mary knew how to swim, she would go to the beach more often.
zh: 如果玛丽会游泳，她会更经常去海滩。

en: If Bob had taken my advice, everything would be all right now.
zh: 如果鲍勃听了我的建议，现在一切都会好起来的。

en: If you want any more wine, go to the cellar and get some.
zh: 如果你还想要酒，去地窖拿一些。

en: If you happen to hear of anybody that wants to buy a house, please let me know.
zh: 如果你碰巧听说有人想买房子，请告诉我。

en: If he has time, he will come.
zh: 如果他有时间，他会来的。

en: If you are going to have a party, please count me in.
zh: 如果你要举办派对，请算我一个。

en: I will help you if possible.
zh: 如果可能，我会帮助你。

en: If you fail, you can always ask for his help.
zh: 如果你失败了，你总是可以寻求他的帮助。

en: Had I known it, I'd have told you about that.
zh: 如果我早知道这件事，我早就告诉你了。

en: If I had known it, I would have gone there.
zh: 如果我早知道这件事，我就会去那里了。

en: If you are to do it, you must make a good start.
zh: 如果你要做这件事，你必须开个好头。

en: You need your parents' permission if you are going to apply for that.
zh: 如果你要申请那个，你需要你父母的许可。

en: Suppose it were true, what would you do?
zh: 假设那是真的，你会怎么做？

en: If it is true, it follows that Nakagawa is guilty.
zh: 如果那是真的，那就意味着中川有罪。

en: If I thought I could get away with it, I wouldn't pay tax at all.
zh: 如果我认为我可以逃脱惩罚，我就根本不会交税。

en: He would be very glad to hear the news.
zh: 他会很高兴听到这个消息的。

en: If you find the man, please let me know at once.
zh: 如果你找到那个人，请立即告诉我。

en: If that washing machine goes wrong again, I shall complain to the manufacturer.
zh: 如果那台洗衣机再次出问题，我会向制造商投诉。

en: If you had not followed the doctor's advice then, you might be ill now.
zh: 如果你当时没有听从医生的建议，你现在可能就生病了。

en: If it had not been for the accident, we would have been in time.
zh: 要不是那场事故，我们本来可以准时到达的。

en: To investigate the incident would take us at least three weeks.
zh: 调查这起事件至少需要我们三个星期的时间。

en: If you see it, you'll go bananas.
zh: 如果你看到它，你就会欣喜若狂。

en: But for the doctor's care, the patient would not be alive.
zh: 要不是医生的悉心照料，病人恐怕就活不下来了。

en: If I had known the news, I would have told you.
zh: 如果我早知道这个消息，我就会告诉你了。

en: If he could not answer the riddle, he would be eaten.
zh: 如果他不能回答这个谜语，他就会被吃掉。

en: If you will lend me the money, I shall be much obliged to you.
zh: 如果你愿意借钱给我，我将非常感谢你。

en: Had it not been for the money, we would not have succeeded.
zh: 要不是有这笔钱，我们不可能成功。

en: If I had the money, I would make a trip around the world.
zh: 如果我有钱，我就要环游世界。

en: If he had been there, I could have given him your message.
zh: 如果他当时在那里，我就能把你的口信带给他了。

en: If it were not for sports, how dull school life would be!
zh: 如果没有运动，学校生活该多么枯燥啊！

en: If all went according to her plan, she would be in great demand.
zh: 如果一切都按她的计划进行，她就会非常受欢迎。

en: If Sue is coming by air, she ought to arrive very soon.
zh: 如果苏坐飞机来，她应该很快就会到达。

en: Please tell me if I get in your way.
zh: 如果我碍着你，请告诉我。

en: If Jane's mother were in Japan, I could invite her to the Doll's Festival.
zh: 如果简的妈妈在日本，我就可以邀请她参加女儿节了。

en: I should like to call on you this evening.
zh: 我今晚想去拜访你。

en: If you have any questions, please let me know.
zh: 如果你有任何问题，请告诉我。

en: If it were not for the computer, how inconvenient our lives would be!
zh: 如果没有电脑，我们的生活该多么不方便啊！

en: If he carries on like this, he's going to wind up in prison.
zh: 如果他继续这样下去，他最终会进监狱的。

en: If you think this is wrong, you must speak out.
zh: 如果你认为这是错误的，你必须说出来。

en: If this proposal is put into practice, the business world will be affected to a significant degree.
zh: 如果这项提议付诸实践，商业界将受到重大影响。

en: We're going to find ourselves in difficulty if we carry on like this.
zh: 如果我们继续这样下去，我们会发现自己陷入困境。

en: If you want this job, you must apply for it by tomorrow.
zh: 如果你想要这份工作，你必须在明天之前申请。

en: If she had not studied English here, she could not have passed the examination.
zh: 如果她没有在这里学习英语，她不可能通过考试。

en: If the coffee is too strong, add some more water.
zh: 如果咖啡太浓，就多加点水。

en: If your coffee is too strong, add some sugar.
zh: 如果你的咖啡太浓，就加些糖。

en: If you eat any cake, I'll whip you.
zh: 如果你吃了任何蛋糕，我就要打你。

en: If Grace had not studied so hard, she would surely have failed the test.
zh: 如果格蕾丝当初没有那么努力学习，她肯定会考试不及格的。

en: You will have to take his place in case he cannot come.
zh: 如果他不能来，你就得代替他的位置。

en: If he had been honest, they would have employed him.
zh: 如果他诚实，他们就会雇用他。

en: If I had enough money, I would buy the book.
zh: 如果我有足够的钱，我就买那本书。

en: It might rain tomorrow.
zh: 明天可能会下雨。

en: He might come tomorrow.
zh: 他明天可能会来。

en: Is there any chance of my borrowing your typewriter?
zh: 我可以借用你的打字机吗？

en: Hey, has this been sitting out on the dinner table all day? It has to go in the refrigerator or it'll go bad.
zh: 嘿，这个是不是一整天都放在餐桌上了？必须放进冰箱里，不然会坏掉的。

en: Do you happen to know how to get downtown from here?
zh: 请问你知道从这里怎么去市中心吗？

en: It might rain before evening.
zh: 傍晚之前可能会下雨。

en: He might change his mind.
zh: 他可能会改变主意。

en: It occurs to me that I may have misunderstood you.
zh: 我突然想到我可能误解你了。

en: If you come this way by any chance, drop in to see me.
zh: 如果你碰巧经过这里，就顺便来拜访我。

en: He said that if he had much money, he would buy the dictionary.
zh: 他说如果他有很多钱，他就会买那本字典。

en: If you need any money, I'll lend you some.
zh: 如果你需要钱，我会借给你一些。

en: If you want any money, I will lend you some.
zh: 如果你想要钱，我会借给你一些。

en: If I had money, I would buy that camera. As it is, I cannot buy it.
zh: 如果我有钱，我会买那台相机。但事实上，我买不起。

en: If you don't have money, you have to do without.
zh: 如果你没有钱，你就得将就着过。

en: I might have to be very angry with you if you were to come alone.
zh: 如果你独自前来，我可能不得不对你非常生气。

en: If Grandma doesn't come, the children will be disappointed.
zh: 如果奶奶不来，孩子们会失望的。

en: Without the ozone layer, we would be in danger.
zh: 如果没有臭氧层，我们就会有危险。

en: If I'm away from home for a period of time, I will stop mail delivery.
zh: 如果我离开家一段时间，我会停止邮件递送。

en: If something doesn't make sense, it probably isn't logical.
zh: 如果某件事不合情理，那它可能就不合逻辑。

en: If it hadn't been for the storm, we would have been in time.
zh: 如果不是因为那场暴风雨，我们本来会准时的。

en: Americans would have responded differently from Japanese.
zh: 美国人的反应会和日本人不一样。

en: If you want to study in the United States, you need to get a student visa.
zh: 如果你想在美国学习，你需要获得学生签证。

en: Without water, the soldiers would have died.
zh: 如果没有水，士兵们早就死了。

en: If he had been with me then, I would not have done such a thing.
zh: 如果当时他和我在一块儿，我就不会做那样的事了。

en: If he had not met with that accident, he would be alive now.
zh: 如果他没有遇到那场事故，他现在还活着。

en: If I had been in time for the train, I would be there now.
zh: 如果我赶上了那趟火车，我现在就到那里了。

en: Were it not for your help, I could never succeed.
zh: 要不是你的帮助，我绝不可能成功。

en: If it had not been for your help, I would have failed.
zh: 如果不是你的帮助，我早就失败了。

en: If it had not been for your help, I would have lost the game.
zh: 如果不是你的帮助，我早就输掉比赛了。

en: But for your help, I could not have done it.
zh: 要不是你的帮助，我不可能完成这件事。

en: If it had not been for your help, we might have failed.

zh: 我再也想不下去这个设计了。

en: There's no other way than this now.
zh: 现在除了这个办法，没有别的办法了。

en: You can't kick me around any more.
zh: 你不能再欺负我了。

en: I've had enough of this program.
zh: 我已经受够了这个节目了。

en: I can bear this broken heart no longer.
zh: 我再也无法忍受这颗破碎的心了。

en: Do you mean that you have already decided on this plan?
zh: 你是说你已经决定了这个计划吗？

en: We've come this far, so we can't stop now. I don't want to backslide.
zh: 我们已经走到这一步了，现在不能停下来。我不想退缩。

en: I've had coffee already.
zh: 我已经喝过咖啡了。

en: I agree with you, except for the part about the profits.
zh: 我同意你的看法，除了关于利润的部分。

en: It is almost ten o'clock.
zh: 快十点了。

en: Have you turned off the gas yet?
zh: 你关煤气了吗？

en: Has Father come home yet?
zh: 爸爸回来了吗？

en: He has gone out for lunch already.
zh: 他已经出去吃午饭了。

en: Have you finished eating your lunch?
zh: 你吃完午饭了吗？

en: Are you all right now?
zh: 你现在没事了吗？

en: It is time for you to go to bed.
zh: 你该睡觉了。

en: I'm through with you.
zh: 我和你完了。

en: They're already here.
zh: 他们已经到了。

en: Aren't you stretched pretty thin already?
zh: 你现在是不是已经忙不过来了？

en: It is time I was going.
zh: 我该走了。

en: She needs another DPT shot.
zh: 她需要再打一针百白破疫苗。

en: Waiter, please bring me another glass of beer.
zh: 服务员，请再给我来一杯啤酒。

en: I'll try again, thank you.
zh: 我会再试一次的，谢谢你。

en: Let me go over the accounts again.
zh: 让我再检查一遍账目。

en: Have you started reading the book yet?
zh: 你开始看那本书了吗？

en: It would be wiser of you not to see him again.
zh: 你最好不要再见他了。

en: I can't stand that noise any longer.
zh: 我再也受不了那个噪音了。

en: Now that you have finished your job, you are free to go home.
zh: 既然你已经完成了工作，你可以自由回家了。

en: In another two weeks you will be able to get out of the hospital.
zh: 再过两周你就可以出院了。

en: It's already nine o'clock.
zh: 已经九点了。

en: It's already September; however, it is very hot.
zh: 已经九月了，但是还是很热。

en: It's already seven.
zh: 已经七点了。

en: It has been raining for seven full days.
zh: 已经下了整整七天的雨了。

en: In another six months you will be able to speak German fluently.
zh: 再过六个月你就能说一口流利的德语了。

en: It's six o'clock already.
zh: 已经六点了。

en: I'll wait another five minutes.
zh: 我再等五分钟。

en: If he had come five minutes later, he would have missed the train.
zh: 如果他晚来五分钟，他就会错过火车了。

en: What do you say to waiting five more minutes?
zh: 再等五分钟怎么样？

en: If only I had left home five minutes earlier.
zh: 要是我早五分钟离开家就好了。

en: I will give you five days' grace.
zh: 我会给你五天的宽限期。

en: It is already past five o'clock.
zh: 已经过了五点了。

en: Three hours of driving has worn me out. Let's pull over at the next rest stop we see.
zh: 开了三个小时的车，我累坏了。我们看到下一个休息站就靠边停吧。

en: Another three miles is more than I can walk.
zh: 再走三英里，我可走不动了。

en: I have three more pages to go.
zh: 我还有三页要看。

en: Walk three more blocks and you will find the museum on your left.
zh: 再走三个街区，你就会在你的左手边找到博物馆。

en: I think we had better wait for another 30 minutes.
zh: 我想我们最好再等三十分钟。

en: Another half hour, and our master will be back here.
zh: 再过半小时，我们的主人就回来了。

en: We've talked over this matter in detail for half an hour already. Let's finish it off.
zh: 关于这件事，我们已经详细谈了半个小时了。我们把它结束了吧。

en: This was a bad week. My train was late two days in a row.
zh: 这周真倒霉。我的火车连续两天都晚点了。

en: I will be back in another two weeks.
zh: 我再过两周就回来了。

en: The rainy season will be over in another two weeks or so.
zh: 雨季大约再过两周就要结束了。

en: I've waited two whole hours. I can't wait any longer.
zh: 我已经等了整整两个小时了。我不能再等了。

en: A few minutes more, and I'll be ready.
zh: 再过几分钟，我就准备好了。

en: You have only to read a few more pages.
zh: 你只需要再读几页。

en: One more step, and you'll be a dead man.
zh: 再往前一步，你就会没命的。

en: One more step, and I would have fallen off the cliff.
zh: 再往前一步，我就要掉下悬崖了。

en: One minute earlier, and they could have caught the bus.
zh: 早一分钟，他们就能赶上公共汽车了。

en: One minute earlier, and we could have seen the Queen.
zh: 早一分钟，我们就能见到女王了。

en: Have another cup.
zh: 再来一杯。

en: How about a second helping?
zh: 再来一份怎么样？

en: I have another year at high school.
zh: 我还有一年高中。

en: I wish to climb Mt. Fuji again.
zh: 我想再去爬一次富士山。

en: I'd like to stay one more night. Is that possible?
zh: 我想再住一晚。可以吗？

en: If I go by air one more time, I'll have flown in an airplane five times.
zh: 如果我再坐一次飞机，我就坐过五次飞机了。

en: If I were to live again, I would like to be a musician.
zh: 如果我能再活一次，我想当一名音乐家。

en: I will have been to the States three times if I go there again.
zh: 如果我再去一次美国，我就去过三次美国了。

en: Would you say it once more?
zh: 你可以再说一遍吗？

en: If I have to go to Kyoto once more, I will have visited it four times this year.
zh: 如果我今年再去一次京都，今年我就去过四次了。

en: Give me another chance to try.
zh: 再给我一次尝试的机会。

en: Try again.
zh: 再试一次。

en: Once more, please.
zh: 请再说一次。

en: May I add a point?
zh: 我可以补充一点吗？

en: Is there any space for one more person?
zh: 还有多余的地方可以再坐一个人吗？

en: Another problem is where to stop the car.
zh: 另一个问题是车停在哪里。

en: Now you are sixteen, you should know better.
zh: 你现在十六岁了，应该懂事了。

en: It's already eleven o'clock. I must be leaving now.
zh: 已经十一点了。我得走了。

en: The town will change in another ten years.
zh: 再过十年，这个城镇会发生变化的。

en: It's been almost ten years, but you're as beautiful as ever.
zh: 快十年了，你还是一如既往地美丽。

en: It's already past ten o'clock.
zh: 已经过了十点钟了。

en: It's already ten o'clock. My mother must be angry.
zh: 已经十点了。我妈妈肯定生气了。

en: If there was just 1,000 yen more, he would have taken 10,000 yen in total.
zh: 如果再多1000日元，他就总共拿走10000日元了。

en: I can't live any longer without him.
zh: 没有他，我活不下去了。

en: I'm tired of it.
zh: 我对它感到厌烦了。

en: We have already finished our dinner.
zh: 我们已经吃完晚饭了。

en: Now I'm wide awake.
zh: 我现在完全清醒了。

en: Now it's time to say good night.
zh: 现在是说晚安的时候了。

en: I'm sick and tired of his lack of taste.
zh: 我厌倦了他那糟糕的品味。

en: The hen is hatching her chicks.
zh: 母鸡正在孵小鸡。

en: Do any of the members agree with you?
zh: 有成员同意你的看法吗？

en: The hen sits on her eggs until they hatch.
zh: 母鸡坐在鸡蛋上直到它们孵化。

en: The hen was sitting on the eggs in the nest.
zh: 母鸡坐在窝里的鸡蛋上。

en: May I trouble you for the salt?
zh: 请问可以麻烦你递一下盐吗？

en: The hen keeps her brood under her.
zh: 母鸡把她的雏鸟藏在身下。

en: I have lost face completely.
zh: 我完全丢了面子。

en: We all know that Mendel was way ahead of his time.
zh: 我们都知道孟德尔远远领先于他的时代。

en: They grow melons under glass.
zh: 他们在玻璃罩下种植甜瓜。

en: They are melons.
zh: 它们是甜瓜。

en: Half of the melon was eaten.
zh: 半个甜瓜被吃掉了。

en: Meros is anything but a liar.
zh: 梅罗斯绝不是一个说谎者。

en: Did I tell you what Melissa said?
zh: 我有没有告诉你梅丽莎说了什么？

en: Mary made a cake without her mother's knowledge.
zh: 玛丽瞒着她妈妈做了蛋糕。

en: Mary aided her mother in cooking.
zh: 玛丽帮助她的母亲做饭。

en: Mary burst into the kitchen.
zh: 玛丽冲进了厨房。

en: Mary wants to become a teacher.
zh: 玛丽想成为一名老师。

en: Mary is interested in politics.
zh: 玛丽对政治感兴趣。

en: Mary can dance well.
zh: 玛丽很会跳舞。

en: Mary prided herself on her beauty.
zh: 玛丽以她的美貌自豪。

en: Mary is lacking in delicacy.
zh: 玛丽缺乏细腻。

en: Mary is a girl full of sentiment.
zh: 玛丽是个充满感情的女孩。

en: Mary will sit still and look at the sea for hours.
zh: 玛丽会静静地坐在那里，看几个小时的海。

en: Mary was scornful of Tom.
zh: 玛丽对汤姆不屑一顾。

en: Mary has become very fond of Charles.
zh: 玛丽已经非常喜欢查尔斯了。

en: Does Mary live next door to the bus driver with whom John worked?
zh: 玛丽是不是住在约翰一起工作过的公交车司机隔壁？

en: Mary was given a raise by her employer.
zh: 玛丽被她的雇主加薪了。

en: He's not coming, according to Mary.
zh: 据玛丽说，他不会来了。

en: Mary beamed her happiness.
zh: 玛丽喜笑颜开。

en: Mary is a better swimmer than Jane.
zh: 玛丽比简更擅长游泳。

en: Mary and Jane are cousins.
zh: 玛丽和简是表姐妹/堂姐妹。

en: The man in charge of the merry-go-round decided to make sure everything was working properly.
zh: 负责旋转木马的人决定确保一切正常运作。

en: Please pass the note around.
zh: 请把纸条传阅一下。

en: Maybe I ought to expand the memory.
zh: 也许我应该扩展一下内存。

en: You should make notes.
zh: 你应该做笔记。

en: Please let me take a look at the menu.
zh: 请让我看一下菜单。

en: I don't have enough RAM.
zh: 我没有足够的内存。

en: May I have the menu, please?
zh: 请给我一份菜单，好吗？

en: Let me see a menu.
zh: 让我看看菜单。

en: May I see a menu, please?
zh: 请给我看一下菜单，好吗？

en: Choose whatever dish you want from the menu.
zh: 从菜单上选择你想要的任何菜。

en: There was a great variety of dishes on the menu.
zh: 菜单上有各种各样的菜肴。

en: In order to gain media recognition, sometimes AIDS patients have to push themselves into the public eye.
zh: 为了获得媒体的认可，有时艾滋病患者不得不把自己推到公众面前。

en: The media sells a trace of hatred at bargain prices.
zh: 媒体以低廉的价格出售一丝仇恨。

en: Rarely does he go out on Sunday.
zh: 他很少在星期天外出。

en: It hardly ever rains here.
zh: 这里几乎不下雨。

en: I seldom go to a library.
zh: 我很少去图书馆。

en: It's getting quite springlike.
zh: 天气变得很有春天的气息了。

en: Read the message once more.
zh: 再读一遍信息。

en: All you have to do is take advantage of this rare opportunity.
zh: 你所要做的就是利用这个难得的机会。

en: It has become noticeably colder.
zh: 天气明显变冷了。

en: How about inviting Meg to the party?
zh: 邀请梅格参加聚会怎么样？

en: Meg must carry on her studies.
zh: 梅格必须继续她的学业。

en: Meg is curious to know everything about Japan.
zh: 梅格很想知道关于日本的一切。

en: Meg is preparing breakfast.
zh: 梅格正在准备早餐。

en: Meg acquired many new friends.
zh: 梅格交了很多新朋友。

en: Meg looks pleased with her new dress.
zh: 梅格看起来对她的新裙子很满意。

en: Meg didn't even look at me.
zh: 梅格甚至没有看我一眼。

en: Meg found a four leaf clover.
zh: 梅格找到了一片四叶草。

en: Meg has a facility for languages.
zh: 梅格有语言天赋。

en: Meg cleared her desk.
zh: 梅格清理了她的桌子。

en: Meg colored the picture.
zh: 梅格给图片上了颜色。

en: Meg attends many school affairs.
zh: 梅格参加很多学校的活动。

en: Meg has a cat as a pet.
zh: 梅格养了一只猫。

en: Meg is filled with excitement.
zh: 梅格充满了兴奋。

en: Meg was happy about meeting Tom again.
zh: 梅格很高兴再次见到汤姆。

en: Meg is beating a drum.
zh: 梅格正在敲鼓。

en: Meg sometimes annoys Ken.
zh: 梅格有时会惹肯生气。

en: Meg bought a can of tomatoes.
zh: 梅格买了一罐番茄。

en: Meg was the only girl that was wearing jeans.
zh: 梅格是唯一一个穿牛仔裤的女孩。

en: Meg agreed to Ken's plan.
zh: 梅格同意了肯的计划。

en: Meg has a lovely face.
zh: 梅格有一张可爱的脸。

en: Meg is the double of her mother.
zh: 梅格和她妈妈长得一模一样。

en: Meg talks too much.
zh: 梅格话太多了。

en: Meg's hair curls naturally.
zh: 梅格的头发是自然卷。

en: Meg is as tall as Ken.
zh: 梅格和肯一样高。

en: Meg's shoes are a little loose.
zh: 梅格的鞋子有点松。

en: I met Meg, who told me the news.
zh: 我遇到了梅格，她告诉了我这个消息。

en: Meg and Ken sat on the bench.
zh: 梅格和肯坐在长椅上。

en: Have you ever been to Mexico?
zh: 你去过墨西哥吗？

en: Mexico has half as many people as Japan.
zh: 墨西哥的人口是日本的一半。

en: A revolution broke out in Mexico.
zh: 墨西哥爆发了一场革命。

en: Mention Mexico, and tacos come to mind.
zh: 提到墨西哥，就会想到炸玉米饼。

en: What is the language spoken in Mexico?
zh: 墨西哥说什么语言？

en: They speak Spanish in Mexico.
zh: 他们在墨西哥说西班牙语。

en: Is Spanish spoken in Mexico?
zh: 墨西哥说西班牙语吗？

en: Spanish is spoken in Mexico.
zh: 墨西哥说西班牙语。

en: I had a difficult time in Mexico because I couldn't understand all of the Spanish.
zh: 我在墨西哥过得很艰难，因为我听不懂所有的西班牙语。

en: I couldn't make out what he meant by 'megafeps'.
zh: 我不明白他说的“megafeps”是什么意思。

en: Fancy forgetting my glasses, it's so embarrassing.
zh: 竟然忘了带眼镜，太尴尬了。

en: I am looking for my glasses.
zh: 我在找我的眼镜。

en: Who is that gentleman in spectacles?
zh: 那位戴眼镜的绅士是谁？

en: I can't find my glasses. I may have left them behind on the train.
zh: 我找不到我的眼镜了。我可能把它们落在火车上了。

en: I can't find my glasses.
zh: 我找不到我的眼镜。

en: Keep in touch by mail.
zh: 通过邮件保持联系。

en: I would like to chat with you by e-mail.
zh: 我想通过电子邮件和你聊天。

en: The maid came in bearing a cake.
zh: 女仆端着蛋糕进来了。

en: I would like to purchase your latest mail order catalogue.
zh: 我想购买你们最新的邮购目录。

en: Dr Mason placed his work above everything.
zh: 梅森博士把工作放在首位。

en: Read the meter.
zh: 读取仪表。

en: May Day is also a festival day for the workers in the world.
zh: 五一劳动节也是世界劳动人民的节日。

en: We are having fish for our main course.
zh: 我们的主菜是鱼。

en: Nobody was to be seen on the main street.
zh: 在主要街道上看不到任何人。

en: Can you tell me where Main Street is?
zh: 请问，你知道主街在哪里吗？

en: Mr Mailer is to stay here till tomorrow.
zh: 梅勒先生将在这里待到明天。

en: Each child has an individual way of thinking.
zh: 每个孩子都有自己独特的思维方式。

en: Each has his own taste.
zh: 每个人都有自己的品味。

en: I'll deal out three to each.
zh: 我给每个人发三张牌。

en: Each of them carried their own pack.
zh: 他们每个人都背着自己的背包。

en: Mabel loves to chew the fat while playing bridge.
zh: 梅贝尔喜欢在玩桥牌的时候闲聊。

en: May sometimes spends the time by herself.
zh: 梅有时候会独自一人度过时光。

en: May has been in Japan for a year.
zh: 梅已经在日本一年了。

en: May's clothes were lying around the room.
zh: 梅的衣服乱扔在房间里。

en: The maid announced each guest.
zh: 女仆宣布了每一位客人的到来。

en: Had you met her aunt before you married May?
zh: 在你和梅结婚之前，你见过她的阿姨吗？

en: The maid arranged the knives and forks on the table.
zh: 女仆把刀叉摆放在桌子上。

en: Go and wake up Mary.
zh: 去叫醒玛丽。

en: Mary's been living in Japan so long. Don't you think it's time she adjusted to Japanese customs?
zh: 玛丽在日本生活了这么久。你不觉得她应该适应日本的习俗了吗？

en: I got word that Mary wants to divorce him.
zh: 我听说玛丽想和他离婚。

en: Mary is both intelligent and kind.
zh: 玛丽既聪明又善良。

en: Mary took out the eggs one by one.
zh: 玛丽一个一个地取出鸡蛋。

en: Mary is going to have a baby next month.
zh: 玛丽下个月要生孩子了。

en: Mary won't listen to her friend's advice.
zh: 玛丽不听她朋友的劝告。

en: Mary is going to help us tomorrow.
zh: 玛丽明天要来帮助我们。

en: Mary crochets lace every night.
zh: 玛丽每天晚上钩花边。

en: Mary left her sister to clean the windows.
zh: 玛丽留下她的妹妹去擦窗户。

en: Mary isn't really sick; she's only putting it on.
zh: 玛丽不是真的生病了；她只是装的。

en: Mary is a bookworm.
zh: 玛丽是个书呆子。

en: Mary is such a worrywart.
zh: 玛丽真是个爱操心的人。

en: Mary really takes after her mother.
zh: 玛丽真像她妈妈。

en: Mary looks like her mother.
zh: 玛丽长得像她妈妈。

en: Mary resembles her mother in appearance, but not in character.
zh: 玛丽外貌像她妈妈，但性格不像。

en: Mary takes after her father.
zh: 玛丽像她爸爸。

en: Mary threw her arms around her father's neck.
zh: 玛丽搂住了她爸爸的脖子。

en: Mary looks unfriendly, but she is really very kind at heart.
zh: 玛丽看起来不友善，但她实际上心地善良。

en: Mary is not poor. On the contrary, she is quite rich.
zh: 玛丽不穷。相反，她很富有。

en: Mary kept on working in spite of her illness.
zh: 玛丽不顾疾病，继续工作。

en: Mary arrived at the hospital.
zh: 玛丽到达了医院。

en: Mary hurried to the hospital.
zh: 玛丽赶紧去了医院。

en: In her misery, Mary looked to her husband for help.
zh: 在痛苦中，玛丽向她的丈夫寻求帮助。

en: Mary is not as tall as he.
zh: 玛丽没有他高。

en: Mary asked after his father.
zh: 玛丽问候了他的父亲。

en: Mary is at a loss what to say to him.
zh: 玛丽不知该对他说什么。

en: Mary refused to marry him, but she gave in at last.
zh: 玛丽拒绝嫁给他，但她最终还是让步了。

en: Mary is tall.
zh: 玛丽个子很高。

en: Mary spoke Japanese slowly.
zh: 玛丽慢慢地说日语。

en: Mary can speak Japanese.
zh: 玛丽会说日语。

en: Mary is setting by money to go to Japan.
zh: 玛丽正在攒钱去日本。

en: Mary remained single all her life in Japan.
zh: 玛丽在日本终身未婚。

en: Mary likes Japan, doesn't she?
zh: 玛丽喜欢日本，不是吗？

en: Mary was reading, with a cat sleeping beside her.
zh: 玛丽在看书，一只猫在她旁边睡觉。

en: Mary understands Chinese.
zh: 玛丽懂中文。

en: Mary took her beauty sleep before the big party.
zh: 玛丽在大派对前睡了个美容觉。

en: Mary often hums a tune as she works in the kitchen.
zh: 玛丽在厨房工作时经常哼着小调。

en: Mary is not used to being made fun of in the presence of others.
zh: 玛丽不习惯在别人面前被人取笑。

en: Mary likes skiing the best of all.
zh: 玛丽最喜欢滑雪。

en: Mary gazed at George in admiration.
zh: 玛丽钦佩地凝视着乔治。

en: Mary asked her son to behave himself.
zh: 玛丽让她的儿子规矩点。

en: Mary ran.
zh: 玛丽跑了。

en: Mary shut herself up in the room, with all the windows closed.
zh: 玛丽把自己关在房间里，所有的窗户都关着。

en: Mary felt happy when she learned the results of the election.
zh: 当玛丽得知选举结果时，她感到很高兴。

en: Mary was able to swim across the river.
zh: 玛丽能够游过这条河。

en: Mary has been ill in bed since last Monday.
zh: 玛丽从上周一以来就一直卧病在床。

en: Mary is said to have been ill last week, but she looks well now.
zh: 据说玛丽上周生病了，但她现在看起来很好。

en: Mary went on a voyage around the world.
zh: 玛丽去环游世界了。

en: Mary was so kind as to help me.
zh: 玛丽非常友善，帮助了我。

en: In her elementary school days, Mary dreamed of becoming a teacher.
zh: 在小学时代，玛丽梦想成为一名教师。

en: Mary is an ingenuous student.
zh: 玛丽是个天真的学生。

en: Mary ought to do her homework on time.
zh: 玛丽应该按时完成她的作业。

en: Mary said she would do her homework.
zh: 玛丽说她会做她的作业。

en: Mary is very ill and I'm afraid she is dying.
zh: 玛丽病得很重，恐怕她快要死了。

en: Mary showed the letter to me.
zh: 玛丽把信给我看了。

en: Mary stood with her hand shading her eyes.
zh: 玛丽站在那里，用手遮住眼睛。

en: Mary is said to have been a great singer in her youth.
zh: 据说玛丽年轻时是一位伟大的歌手。

en: Mary has a social nature.
zh: 玛丽具有社交性格。

en: Mary is studying in her room.
zh: 玛丽正在她的房间里学习。

en: Mary put her piano up for sale.
zh: 玛丽把她的钢琴拿出来卖了。

en: Mary didn't refer to the accident she had seen.
zh: 玛丽没有提及她所见到的那场事故。

en: Mary oiled her bicycle.
zh: 玛丽给她的自行车上了油。

en: Mary's kind nature quickly won her the friendship of her classmates.
zh: 玛丽善良的本性很快赢得了同学们的友谊。

en: Mary came up to me when she saw me.
zh: 玛丽看到我的时候，就向我走来。

en: Mary gave me an American doll.
zh: 玛丽给了我一个美国娃娃。

en: Mary said to me, "are you ill?"
zh: 玛丽对我说：“你生病了吗？”

en: Mary told me that she was glad to see me.
zh: 玛丽告诉我她很高兴见到我。

en: Mary broke in on our conversation.
zh: 玛丽打断了我们的谈话。

en: Mary took sides with me against my teacher.
zh: 玛丽站在我这边，反对我的老师。

en: Mary scarcely seems to care for me, does she?
zh: 玛丽似乎不太关心我，是吗？

en: Mary blamed Jack for leaving their children unattended.
zh: 玛丽责怪杰克没有照看好他们的孩子。

en: Mary stayed up late last night.
zh: 玛丽昨晚熬夜了。

en: Mary doesn't dance much now, but I know she used to a lot.
zh: 玛丽现在不怎么跳舞了，但我知道她以前经常跳。

en: Mary was about to burst out laughing.
zh: 玛丽差点要 burst out laughing (笑出声) 了。

en: Mary has finished her Japanese assignment.
zh: 玛丽已经完成了她的日语作业。

en: How is Mary?
zh: 玛丽怎么样了？

en: Mary was John's heartthrob all through high school.
zh: 玛丽是约翰整个高中时期的梦中情人。

en: When Mary was spoken to by a stranger, she was at a loss for words.
zh: 当玛丽被陌生人搭讪时，她一时语塞。

en: Despite the fact that Mary keeps saying I was the only man she'd like to marry, when I proposed to her, she said "NO". I cannot make head or tail of it.
zh: 尽管玛丽一直说我是她唯一想嫁的男人，但当我向她求婚时，她却说了“不”。我简直摸不着头脑。

en: Mary stared back at him in surprise.
zh: 玛丽惊讶地回望着他。

en: Mary looked at herself in the mirror.
zh: 玛丽照着镜子。

en: Mary spread the big map on the table.
zh: 玛丽把大地图铺在桌子上。

en: Mary is sitting at the desk.
zh: 玛丽正坐在桌子旁。

en: Mary pretended she was sick to avoid going to school.
zh: 玛丽假装生病以避免去上学。

en: Mary had to go to school.
zh: 玛丽不得不去上学。

en: Mary went down to the kitchen.
zh: 玛丽下楼去了厨房。

en: Mary is respected by everyone.
zh: 玛丽受人尊敬。

en: Mary can swim.
zh: 玛丽会游泳。

en: Mary can't swim, and John can't, either.
zh: 玛丽不会游泳，约翰也不会。

en: Mary has nobody to talk with, but she doesn't feel lonely.
zh: 玛丽没有人可以说话，但她并不感到孤独。

en: Mary is a girl who is pleasant to talk with.
zh: 玛丽是一个很健谈的女孩。

en: Mary decided never to see him any more.
zh: 玛丽决定再也不见他了。

en: Has Mary started yet?
zh: 玛丽开始了吗？

en: Mary likes milk very much.
zh: 玛丽非常喜欢牛奶。

en: Mary has not started yet.
zh: 玛丽还没有开始。

en: Mary has failed again. After all she is still young.
zh: 玛丽又失败了。毕竟她还年轻。

en: Mary always assists her boyfriend in doing his assignments.
zh: 玛丽总是帮助她的男朋友做作业。

en: Mary can't even read French, much less speak it.
zh: 玛丽甚至看不懂法语，更不用说说了。

en: Mary takes Bill's kindness for granted.
zh: 玛丽认为比尔的善意是理所当然的。

en: Mary had a dance with him at the party.
zh: 玛丽在聚会上和他跳了一支舞。

en: Mary plays the piano.
zh: 玛丽弹钢琴。

en: Mary is a very sociable person.
zh: 玛丽是一个非常善于交际的人。

en: Mary is too stubborn to apologize.
zh: 玛丽太固执了，不肯道歉。

en: Mary is so nice a girl that she is loved by everybody.
zh: 玛丽是如此好的一个女孩，以至于每个人都喜欢她。

en: Mary is a very pretty girl.
zh: 玛丽是一个非常漂亮的女孩。

en: Mary said to herself "What shall I do?".
zh: 玛丽自言自语道：“我该怎么办？”

en: Mary closed the door quietly.
zh: 玛丽悄悄地关上了门。

en: It is believed that Mary is good at tennis.
zh: 人们相信玛丽擅长网球。

en: Mary has just come home.
zh: 玛丽刚回到家。

en: Mary became a typist.
zh: 玛丽成了一名打字员。

en: Mary is the prettier of the two.
zh: 玛丽是她们两个中比较漂亮的一个。
